channel.title: Christ Church Bromley WordWiseXtra
channel.itunes:subtitle: WordWiseXtra meeting recordings from Christ Church Bromley in London, United Kindom
channel.itunes:summary: Training evenings with a guest speaker, aimed at everyone who desires to become better at handling God's Word. Wednesdays, 8.00pm at Christ Church Hall. Meal available from 7.15pm, coffee and cake from 7.45pm. Please contact the church office: office@ccbromley.net or +44 (0) 20 8464 1898.
channel.itunes:author: Digital Media Service @ Christ Church Bromley
